scripts.dev: concurrently "cd vitereact && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm i && npm run start"
scripts.clean: npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify
scripts.prepare: npm set fetch-retries 5 && npm set fetch-retry-mintimeout 100000 && npm set fetch-retry-maxtimeout 600000 && npm set network-timeout 300000 && npm ci --prefer-offline
